translations: 浪费的；无远见的；无先见之明的

sentences.sentence: This young man has lived improvident life.
sentences.translation: 这个年轻人过着奢侈的生活。

sentences.sentence: You will pay for your improvident undisciplined behavior.
sentences.translation: 你会为自己轻率任性的行为付出代价的。

sentences.sentence: You will pay for your improvident and undisciplined behavior.
sentences.translation: 你会为自己轻率任性的行为付出代价的。
